articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: Russia says 'sudden death syndrome' behind Navalny's demise - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: Russian authorities inform Navalny's mother that 'sudden death syndrome' was the reason behind his death in prison. World leaders condemn the death and hold Putin responsible.
articles.content: President Biden: Putin targets his own people, responsible for Navalnys death
